name: Osso
description: Open Source Single Sign-On - authenticate SAML users from SSO IDPs into your application

ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Your email address for creating the first user account

BASE_URL.description: The host where your application is deployed - replace APP-NAME with the app name you choose above, and be usre to update this ENV var when you set up a custom domain

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

CYPRESS_INSTALL_BINARY.description: Prevent heroku from installing the Cypress binary during deploy

SMTP_LOGIN.description: SMTP server login - email sending is needed for team management. We recommend Mailgun

SMTP_DOMAIN.description: A domain you own and can send SMTP emails from

SMTP_SERVER.description: The location of your SMTP server for sending email, i.e. smtp.mailgun.org
